languages.text: "Расплата, Лорд-капитан. Расплата за великое высокомерие. Многие годы демоны преследуют меня, идут по моему запаху, шлют страшные послания, охотятся... И вот я попался. Сущности, явившиеся сюда во время обряда, были изгнаны, но эхо их присутствия прилипло к теням и задержалось. Оно проросло во мраке и вцепилось в мой разум".

"A reckoning, Lord Captain. A reckoning for my great arrogance. Daemons have been pursuing me for years, following my scent, sending me dire messages, hunting me... And now they have me. The entities that manifested here during the ritual were banished, but a lingering echo of their presence has latched onto the shadows. It has sprouted in the darkness and pounced upon my mind."
languages.original_text: "Расплата, Лорд-капитан. Расплата за великое высокомерие. Многие годы демоны преследуют меня, идут по моему запаху, шлют страшные послания, охотятся... И вот я попался. Сущности, явившиеся сюда во время обряда, были изгнаны, но эхо их присутствия прилипло к теням и задержалось. Оно проросло во мраке и вцепилось в мой разум".

traits.locale_text: "A reckoning, Lord Captain. A reckoning for my great arrogance. Daemons have been pursuing me for years, following my scent, sending me dire messages, hunting me... And now they have me. The entities that manifested here during the ritual were banished, but a lingering echo of their presence has latched on to the shadows. It has grown in the darkness and pounced upon my mind."

languages.text: «Un castigo, Lord Capitán. Un castigo por mi soberana arrogancia. Los daemons llevan años persiguiéndome, buscando mi rastro, enviándome mensajes terribles, dándome caza... Y por fin me tienen. Las entidades que se manifestaron durante el ritual se expulsaron, pero un eco de su presencia se ancló en las sombras. Ha brotado de las tinieblas y ha asaltado mi mente».
languages.original_text: "A reckoning, Lord Captain. A reckoning for my great arrogance. Daemons have been pursuing me for years, following my scent, sending me dire messages, hunting me... And now they have me. The entities that manifested here during the ritual were banished, but a lingering echo of their presence has latched onto the shadows. It has sprouted in the darkness and pounced upon my mind."

traits.locale_text: «Un castigo, Lord Capitán. Un castigo por mi soberana arrogancia. Los daemons llevan años persiguiéndome, buscando mi rastro, enviándome mensajes terribles, dándome caza... Y por fin me tienen. Las entidades que se manifestaron durante el ritual se expulsaron, pero un eco de su presencia se ancló en las sombras. Ha brotado de las tinieblas y ha asaltado mi mente».

languages.text: 「これは罰なんだ、ロード・キャプテン。私の傲慢さへの罰さ。ディーモンには何年も追われていた。奴らは私のにおいをたどり、不吉なメッセージを送りつけ、私を探し回っていた…そして今、捕まってしまったのだ。儀式中に現れたモノは追い払ったのだが、ソレの残響が影に残っていた。闇の中で芽を出し、私の心に襲いかかったのだ」
languages.original_text: "A reckoning, Lord Captain. A reckoning for my great arrogance. Daemons have been pursuing me for years, following my scent, sending me dire messages, hunting me... And now they have me. The entities that manifested here during the ritual were banished, but a lingering echo of their presence has latched onto the shadows. It has sprouted in the darkness and pounced upon my mind."

traits.locale_text: 「これは罰なんだ、ロード・キャプテン。私の傲慢さへの罰さ。ディーモンには何年も追われていた。奴らは私のにおいをたどり、不吉なメッセージを送りつけ、私を探し回っていた…そして今、捕まってしまったのだ。儀式中に現れたモノは追い払ったのだが、ソレの残響が影に残っていた。闇の中で芽を出し、私の心に襲いかかったのだ」

languages.text: “是对我的清算，舰长大人，是我傲慢自大招致的报应。这么多年来，那些恶魔一直在追踪我。它们追踪我的气味，向我传达可怕的信息，不断追捕我……如今，他们找到了我。尽管仪式期间出现的恶魔受到了驱逐，但他们的回响依然萦绕在阴影之中。它在黑暗中发芽，猛地袭向了我的心灵。”
languages.original_text: "A reckoning, Lord Captain. A reckoning for my great arrogance. Daemons have been pursuing me for years, following my scent, sending me dire messages, hunting me... And now they have me. The entities that manifested here during the ritual were banished, but a lingering echo of their presence has latched onto the shadows. It has sprouted in the darkness and pounced upon my mind."

traits.locale_text: “是对我的清算，舰长大人，是我傲慢自大招致的报应。这么多年来，那些恶魔一直在追踪我。它们追踪我的气味，向我传达可怕的信息，不断追捕我……如今，他们找到了我。尽管仪式期间出现的恶魔受到了驱逐，但他们的回响依然萦绕在阴影之中。它在黑暗中发芽，猛地袭向了我的心灵。”

languages.text: "Eine Abrechnung, Lord Captain. Eine Abrechnung ob meiner gewaltigen Arroganz. Dämonen verfolgen mich seit Jahren, wittern meine Fährte, schicken mir düstere Botschaften, jagen mich ... Und nun haben sie mich. Die Wesen, die sich hier während des Rituals manifestiert haben, wurden verbannt, doch ein Echo ihrer Anwesenheit blieb zurück und heftete sich an die Schatten. Es ist in der Dunkelheit herangewachsen und hat meinen Verstand attackiert."
languages.original_text: "A reckoning, Lord Captain. A reckoning for my great arrogance. Daemons have been pursuing me for years, following my scent, sending me dire messages, hunting me... And now they have me. The entities that manifested here during the ritual were banished, but a lingering echo of their presence has latched onto the shadows. It has sprouted in the darkness and pounced upon my mind."

traits.locale_text: "Eine Abrechnung, Lord Captain. Eine Abrechnung ob meiner gewaltigen Arroganz. Dämonen verfolgen mich seit Jahren, wittern meine Fährte, schicken mir düstere Botschaften, jagen mich ... Und nun haben sie mich. Die Wesen, die sich hier während des Rituals manifestiert haben, wurden verbannt, doch ein Echo ihrer Anwesenheit blieb zurück und heftete sich an die Schatten. Es ist in der Dunkelheit herangewachsen und hat meinen Verstand attackiert."

languages.text: « Des représailles, Votre Seigneurie. La juste rétribution de mon arrogance sans bornes. Cela fait des années que ces démons me suivent à la trace, me pourchassent et m'envoient des signes effroyables... Et ils ont fini par m'avoir. Si les entités qui se sont manifestées pendant le rituel ont été bannies, un écho de leur présence demeure dans les ombres. Il a germé à la faveur des ténèbres avant de jeter son dévolu sur mon esprit. »
languages.original_text: "A reckoning, Lord Captain. A reckoning for my great arrogance. Daemons have been pursuing me for years, following my scent, sending me dire messages, hunting me... And now they have me. The entities that manifested here during the ritual were banished, but a lingering echo of their presence has latched onto the shadows. It has sprouted in the darkness and pounced upon my mind."

traits.locale_text: « Des représailles, Votre Seigneurie. La juste rétribution de mon arrogance sans bornes. Cela fait des années que ces démons me suivent à la trace, me pourchassent et m'envoient des signes effroyables... Et ils ont fini par m'avoir. Si les entités qui se sont manifestées pendant le rituel ont été bannies, un écho de leur présence demeure dans les ombres. Il a germé à la faveur des ténèbres avant de jeter son dévolu sur mon esprit. »

languages.text: "Bir hesaplaşmaydı Lord Kaptan. Muazzam küstahlığımın hesaplaşmasıydı. İblisler senelerce peşimi bırakmadı. Kokumu takip edip bana uğursuz mesajlar gönderiyor, beni avlıyorlar... Artık ellerindeyim. Ayin esnasında burada kendilerini gösteren varlıklar defedildi. Fakat mevcudiyetlerinin geçmek bilmeyen yankısı, gölgelere asılı kaldı. Karanlıkta kök salarak zihnime hücum etti."
languages.original_text: "A reckoning, Lord Captain. A reckoning for my great arrogance. Daemons have been pursuing me for years, following my scent, sending me dire messages, hunting me... And now they have me. The entities that manifested here during the ritual were banished, but a lingering echo of their presence has latched onto the shadows. It has sprouted in the darkness and pounced upon my mind."
